name: Custom RSS Feeds by Envintus, LLC
author: Hunter Satterwhite

sections.description: Add custom RSS feeds to your WordPress installation and customize the feeds using theme templates. Each feed contains a unique slug and can use either a custom theme template or if no template is provided then the feed will use WordPress’ default RSS2 template. Easily keep track of what your feeds do by adding a description to them or testing them out clicking the quick link provied in the “existing feeds” table listing.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the custom-feeds directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Add custom RSS feeds to your WordPress installation and customize the feeds using theme templates.
